titleStmt.title: It is this day ordered by the Lords spiritual and temporal in Parliament assembled, that all licences granted by this House to any papist, or reputed papist, to come to and stay in town, be ... declared to be void
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill, Thomas Newcomb, and Henry Hills,

notesStmt.note: At head of title: Die Lune 5 Maii 1679.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
